nav.div: Williamsburg Community School District » News » What's New » COVID-19 Updates and Links

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled COVID-19 Updates and Links

br.br: Hello, Raider Families. We wanted to put together recent updates regarding COVID-19 together in one place. As we release information to our families, we'll also post it here so that you have one place to look if you need to refer back to some correspondence. With questions about this information, please email me (chadgarber@williamsburg.k12.ia.us), call the office (319-668-1059), or call or text me (319-461-7484) and I'll do the best I can to answer your questions.
